definitions.definition: A pointed projection on a horseshoe to prevent its slipping .
A spike on the sole of a boot to prevent slipping, particularly used in logging .
Alternative form of caulk ( “ a short sleep, nap ” ) .

main_definition: A pointed projection on a horseshoe to prevent its slipping .
secondary_definitions: A spike on the sole of a boot to prevent slipping, particularly used in logging .
Alternative form of caulk ( “ a short sleep, nap ” ) .
